card.title: Description
card.content:
With this functionality you can ...
- import a project into your workspace.

guide.title: Import a project into your workspace

steps.step: Select a _Project Database File_ (.db) from your computer in the file dialog.
Either accept the project name or enter a new project name.
Wait until the project is imported.

details.item: The _Project Database File_ is a SQLite3 database file. To ensure a successful import, the project must have been exported through the PySSA application.
